name: No More Legs
description:
No More Legs When life takes away your legs but gives you a hook, you have to make the best out of it. 

A game made for the 3rd Winter Game Jam 2019. The topic was "Unconventional Travel" and made within 48 hours.

In a world where robots and racoons are living peacefully next to each other, Robbie, a cute little robot, comes across the Mech.-Racoon Dexter, who steals his leg to turn himself slowly into an android. But thankfully, Robbie has a hook with which he can follow Dexter after. 

How to Play
  • With Legs
    • A & W - Move Left & Right
    • Spacebar - Jump
  • Without Legs
    • Left Mouse Button - Shoot Hook
    • Hold Left Mouse Button - Stay Hooked
Credits Tarek Abdel-Aziz
